snippet: Brian Elliott made 27 saves in his 100th game with St. Louis and stopped all three shootout attempts to lift the Blues over the Colorado Avalanche 3-2 Saturday night....

headline.print_headline: Elliott, Tarasenko Lead Blues Past Avs 3-2 in SO
headline.main: Elliott, Tarasenko Lead Blues Past Avs 3-2 in SO

lead_paragraph: Brian Elliott made 27 saves in his 100th game with St. Louis and stopped all three shootout attempts to lift the Blues over the Colorado Avalanche 3-2 Saturday night.
